name: file-classifier
description: A macOS TypeScript CLI tool for manually classifying files or CSV rows via web interface

scripts.build: node scripts/generate-assets.cjs && bun build --compile --target=bun-darwin-arm64 src/cli.ts --outfile dist/file-classifier
scripts.build:intel: node scripts/generate-assets.cjs && bun build --compile --target=bun-darwin-x64 src/cli.ts --outfile dist/file-classifier-intel
scripts.build:linux-x64: node scripts/generate-assets.cjs && bun build --compile --target=bun-linux-x64 src/cli.ts --outfile dist/file-classifier-linux-x64
scripts.build:linux-arm64: node scripts/generate-assets.cjs && bun build --compile --target=bun-linux-arm64 src/cli.ts --outfile dist/file-classifier-linux-arm64
scripts.build:all: node scripts/generate-assets.cjs && bun build --compile --target=bun-darwin-arm64 src/cli.ts --outfile dist/file-classifier && bun build --compile --target=bun-darwin-x64 src/cli.ts --outfile dist/file-classifier-intel
scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:e2e
